titleStmt.title: A proclamation, declaring war against the French king. Edinburgh, the 6th of August, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Privy Council,
